channel.title: Posts on Your Favourite Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Your Favourite Blog

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Who am I Hi, I’m Roberto Gongora, but I like being called Rob. I’m a software developer specialised in web applications and infrastructure. I also love videogames, cooking and writing. Why am I starting this blog? I’ve wanted to start a blog for a long time, but I never dared to do so. I love writing, and this is an excellent platform to do it.
